A virtual reality experience where users can explore a world made entirely of paper, where they can interact with paper characters, manipulate paper objects, and even create their own paper art.
A game where players take on the role of a time-traveling librarian, tasked with collecting and preserving rare and ancient books from different time periods and cultures.
A social media platform where users can share and discover art made from repurposed and upcycled materials, with a focus on sustainability and creativity.

A mobile app that generates personalized book recommendations based on users' reading habits and preferences, with a twist: each recommendation comes with a unique, hand-drawn illustration that matches the book's genre and style.
A community-driven project where people can contribute to a massive, collaborative mural made from recycled materials, with a focus on promoting environmental awareness and community engagement.
